nodes.text: Baron Administrator, also spelled Baron-Administrator, was a title borne by the individual in charge of certain facilities, including Cloud City, a floating metropolis suspended in the clouds of Bespin, and the space station best known as the Wheel.

Around the time of the Battle of Hoth, Cloud City's Baron Administrator was Lando Calrissian, a position he won in a game of cards. Calrissian abandoned the title during the Galactic Empire's occupation of Cloud City, though he later reclaimed the title following the fall of the Iron Blockade. By 7 ABY,[source?] Calrissian was no longer the Baron Administrator.
